title: PromptLint
shortDescription: A VS Code extension that helps you write better prompts for AI systems like ChatGPT, Claude, and other LLMs. It transforms rough, unstructured prompts into clear, well-organized prompts with one-click refactoring, an interactive panel, multiple output options, and support for OpenAI, Claude, and compatible APIs.

title: Expense Tracker
shortDescription: The goal of this project is to develop a lightweight, fully client-side Expense Tracker application using Angular that enables users to efficiently record, manage, and visualize personal expenses.

title: Angular Codebase Analyzer
shortDescription: The Angular Codebase Analyzer is a developer-focused tool designed to automatically scan, parse, and evaluate Angular project structures. It identifies architectural inconsistencies, unused modules, poor folder organization, and violations of best practices—all without requiring any manual inspection.

title: AppFlow Explorer
shortDescription: AppFlow Explorer is a frontend-only web application designed to map and visualize an entire software platform’s functional and technical flow — from user interactions (UI) all the way to database procedures (DB). title: Developer Portfolio
shortDescription: Modern, responsive portfolio website with blog functionality and dynamic content management.
